msts.label: Measuring stations
msts.help: Enter one or more measuring stations to load data for.

_info.text: To find the identifiers for the measuring stations use the list of measuring stations provided by the Federal Office for Radiation Protection.

useCosmicTerrestrial.label: Use cosmic and terrestrial components
useCosmicTerrestrial.help: If enabled, additional states for the cosmic and terrestrial ADR components will be used.

updateHistory.label: Update history
updateHistory.help: If this is enabled and a history for a value state is configured, the adapter tries to load missing history values for the last 7 days to fill up the history.

timeout.label: Timeout while loading data
timeout.help: Timeout for each request to the server in seconds. Default is 30.

_infoText2.label: See also detailed information from the BfS.
